overview: Just when you thought it was over, we're bringing you 12 more scenes with over 5 hours and 15 mins. of pure lesbian bliss! Join Cindy Hope, Blue Angel, Sophie Moone, Aletta Ocean, Brandy Smile, and many more stunning lesbians as they indulge in a round of sweet and sensual girl-on-girl sex. Let the orgasms fly, because these are beautiful lesbians!
title: Beautiful Lesbians 3
